basics.name: Mothi Gowtham Ashok Kumar
basics.label: Data Scientist
basics.summary: I'm a Passionate, solutions-oriented Data Scientist with a keen interest in leveraging data-driven, machine learning, and AI technologies to drive business improvement. Boasting over 5 years of experience in the field, I've made significant contributions in various data science capacities across multiple industries including Healthcare, Oil, Gas and Petroleum, IoT development, and Technology.

work.name: Indiana IoT Lab partnered with ClearObject
summary: Led a computer vision project for quality control in manufacturing, handling data collection, labelling and model fine-tuning on GCP with PyTorch and TensorFlow.

Focused on segmentation (U-net), detection (YOLO), and classification models. Monitored and Deployed models on edge devices and implemented in real-time client applications with NVIDIAâ€™s TensorRT & DeepStream for boosting operational efficiency.
work.highlights: Python, PySpark, OpenCV, PyTorch, TensorFlow, Google Cloud, Darwin V7, ONNX, YOLO, U-net, NVIDIA's TensorRT, DeepStream

work.name: The Polis Center
summary: Managed data analysis for Central Indiana State, covering data cleaning, exploratory work, statistical modeling, and reporting.

Crafted 3 precise regression models to forecast aging trends, achieving 95% accuracy, and uncovering a significant 12% rise inthe population aged 65+ over the last decade. Reported Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) to technical & non-technical audiences.
Coordinated with a diverse range of stakeholders & experts over 6 months in decision making to ensure data quality and relevance.
work.highlights: Python, R, SQL, ETL, Machine Learning, Data Engineering, Forecasting

work.name: Indiana University
summary: Published a paper on Data-To-Question Generation Using Deep Learning by improving keyword extraction and questiongeneration accuracy rate to 30% with Natural Language Processing (NLP) models (NLTK, LDA, BERT, & SpaCy).

Formulated semantically correct questions by calculating the semantic distance of over 1000 keywords from multi-dimensionaldatasets, deploying ML data pipelines, and the pre-trained Deep Learning Neural Network models SHERLOCK & SATO.
work.highlights: Deep Learning, Neural Networks, NLP, Python

work.name: Vugha Technological Solutions
summary: Decreased the Total Recordable Incident Rate (TRIR) by 12% for an Energy: Oil and Gas client by implementing forecastingalgorithms, with results visualized in reports, charts and dashboards using Tableau/Matplotlib/Seaborn/ggplot.
Performed data engineering, predictive modeling, including Clustering, resulting in a 20% diminution in Accident rate.
Optimized data extraction and transformations processes (ETL) using Python resulted in a 60% processing time reduction.
work.highlights: Python, ETL, Tableau, Power BI, Analysis

work.name: e-Soft IT Solutions
summary: Proficiently designed and implemented SQL queries, generating over 1000 tables, stored procedures, and views to data managementwhile transforming the data, resulting in a 10-hour weekly minimization in manual effort.
Developed SQL automation processes to bolster system reliability and performance, cutting downtime by 12%.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to resolve DB-related issues, amplifying user experience, and minimizing disruptions.
work.highlights: SQL, MySQL, SQL Server, NoSQL and other SQL databases

projects.name: Quantum Computing
projects.summary: Quantum computing is the use of quantum-mechanical phenomena such as superposition and entanglement to perform computation. Computers that perform quantum computations are known as quantum computers.

publications.name: Data-To-Question Generation Using Deep Learning
publications.publisher: 2023 4th International Conference on Big Data Analytics and Practices
publications.summary: This paper presents a system designed to automatically generate insightful questions from relational datasets, aiming to improve public access and utilization of data from governmental and non-governmental organizations. The process involves data extraction, cleaning, pre-processing, entity recognition via deep learning, and question formulation. The study demonstrates that this method can produce questions that are comparable or even superior in accuracy to those generated by AI engines like ChatGPT, highlighting its potential to enhance factual understanding of datasets while acknowledging current limitations and future work directions.

awards.title: Vugha Rise and Shine
